com.algebraweb.editor.client
Class PlanModelManipulator

java.lang.Object
  com.algebraweb.editor.client.PlanModelManipulator

public class PlanModelManipulator
extends java.lang.Object

Handles PlanManipulation and synchronization with the server plan model. This class works as an interface for the server model. Thus, all methods affecting the structure of one of the query plans or providing information about any of them should go in here. If possible, don't call RemoteManipulationService(-Async) (rmsa) directly.

Author:
Patrick Brosi

blurr

public void blurr(boolean blur)

copy

public void copy(int planid)
Invoke a copy on a certain plan. All selected nodes will be written into the servers 'clipboard', meaning that they will be saved to the session for a later pasting.

Parameters:
planid - the plan the copy functoin should be invoked on

Removes edges from a plan

Parameters:
map - the edges to be removed as a HashMap providing a tuple (from,to) as a key and an position integer as a value
planid - the plan the edges should be removed from

getManipulationService

public RemoteManipulationServiceAsync getManipulationService()

paste

public void paste(int planid,
                  int x,
                  int y)
Invoke a paste on a plan at a specific position. All nodes contained in the sessions 'clipboard' will be pasted into the plan. The node with the lowest y-value will be inserted at (x,y), all other nodes will be positioned in respect to their former relative position to the top node.

Parameters:
planid - the plan the paste should be invoked on
x - the x position the top node should be inserted at
y - the y position the top node should be inserted at

updateNodeContent

public void updateNodeContent(int planid,
                              int nid,
                              java.lang.String XML)
Update a PlanNode's content using XML source

Parameters:
planid - the plan the node is on
nid - the node's id
XML - node's new XML source. Note that changes to the node's id or the node's type in the source will be ignored.

updateNodeContent
